Package pt.ist.phylolib.command.distance

Class Distance

java.lang.Object
pt.ist.phylolib.command.distance.Distance
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICommand<Dataset,​Matrix>
Direct Known Subclasses:
GrapeTree, Hamming, Kimura
public abstract class Distance
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICommand<Dataset,​Matrix>
Responsible for calculating a distance matrix from a phylogenetic dataset.
